name: Arch Menara
description:
NOTE>>> Originally made in December 2012. One of the first projects I worked on.

Overview 

In Arch Menara, you control a cast of characters that include Mia, a young warrior looking for sister; Varen, a thief with a troublesome past; and Tairo, a lancer hoping to save his troubled village. 

Features: 

  • Strong emphasis on story and character development 
  • Rewarding exploration 
  • Challenging battles 
  • If you lose a battle, don’t worry: you can just try again. There is no game over. 
  • If a character dies in battle, but you win the battle, he’ll be back with 1HP waiting for some healing. 
  • MP recovery while you’re walking around and also during battle. 
  • Around 30 minutes of gameplay, depending on your skill level. 

This is my first RPG Maker game release. I hope you enjoy it!
